item.title: GLADSTAD
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: The GLADSTAD upholstered bed frame has a clean and modern design, while being comfortable and inviting with its padded headboard and soft cover with a slight texture. Sleep tight – in style!
item.content:encoded:
The GLADSTAD upholstered bed frame is a modern classic with a clean and sleek design.
The padded headboard serves as a comfortable backrest, for example when reading or enjoying your weekend breakfast in bed.
The soft KABUSA cover has a slight texture and is woven with threads in 3 different grey tones that hide light stains.
The simple and versatile design coordinates well with other bedroom furniture and fits perfectly in any modern bedroom.
You can easily vacuum under the bed frame to keep the space clean and dust-free.
There’s plenty of space under the bed for storage boxes – great for stowing extra duvets and sheets.
DesignerOla Wihlborg

item.title: NIEDEN
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: The natural solid wood is beautiful as it is or you can make it more personal by staining, painting or waxing it. Also, the bed frame is high enough so you can place storage boxes underneath.
item.content:encoded:
The compact design is perfect for tight spaces or under low ceilings, so you can make the most of your available space.
The hard-wearing solid pine has natural variations in grain, color and texture, giving every piece a unique look.
If you oil, wax, lacquer or stain the untreated solid wood surface it will be more durable and easy to care for.
There’s plenty of space under the bed for storage boxes – perfect for storing extra duvets and pillows.
You can easily vacuum under the bed frame to keep the space clean and dust-free.

item.title: BRIMNES
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: A bed frame with hidden storage in several places – perfect if you live in a small space. The BRIMNES series has several smart solutions that help you save space.
item.content:encoded:
Everything is kept close at hand with integrated storage in the headboard.
Ample storage space is hidden neatly under the bed in 4 large drawers. Perfect for storing duvets, pillows and bed linen.
Hide cables for lamps and chargers by feeding them through the holes on the top of the headboard.
You can sit up comfortably in bed thanks to the high headboard; just prop some pillows behind your back and you will have a comfortable place to read or watch TV.
This versatile bed frame will look great with your choice of textiles and bedroom furniture.
Adjustable bed sides allow you to use mattresses of different thicknesses.
LURÖY slatted bed base with curved slats helps to absorb your body weight and supports your body, while the open construction allows air to circulate and keeps the mattress fresh.
DesignerIKEA of Sweden/K Hagberg/M Hagberg

item.title: MALM
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: A clean design with solid wood veneer. Place the bed on its own or with the headboard against a wall. If you need space for extra bedding, add MALM bed storage boxes on casters.
item.content:encoded:
Wood veneer gives you the same look, feel and beauty as solid wood with unique variations in grain, color and texture.
This versatile bed frame will look great with your choice of textiles and bedroom furniture.
You can sit up comfortably in bed thanks to the high headboard – just prop some pillows behind your back and you will have a comfortable place to read or watch TV.
You can easily vacuum under the bed frame to keep the space clean and dust-free.
Adjustable bed sides allow you to use mattresses of different thicknesses.
LURÖY slatted bed base with curved slats helps to absorb your body weight and supports your body, while the open construction allows air to circulate and keeps the mattress fresh.
DesignerEva Lilja Löwenhielm/IKEA of Sweden

item.title: SOTENAS
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: A youthful and festive armchair. This the description of PUCK when it was launched in the 1969 catalogue. We’ve named it SOTENÄS in the Nytillverkad collection, but the design is still by Gillis Lundgren.
item.content:encoded: A youthful and festive armchair. This the description of PUCK when it was launched in the 1969 catalogue. We’ve named it SOTENÄS in the Nytillverkad collection, but the design is still by Gillis Lundgren.

item.title: POANG X
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: POÄNG armchair has stylish curved lines in bentwood, providing nice support for the neck and comfy resilience. It’s been in our range for several decades and is still just as popular. Want to try it too?
item.content:encoded: POÄNG armchair has stylish curved lines in bentwood, providing nice support for the neck and comfy resilience. It’s been in our range for several decades and is still just as popular. Want to try it too?

item.title: POANG
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: POÄNG armchair has stylish curved lines in bentwood, providing nice support for the neck and comfy resilience. It’s been in our range for several decades and is still just as popular. Want to try it too?
item.content:encoded:
The layer-glued bent wood frame gives the armchair a comfortable resilience, making it perfect to relax in.
The high back provides good support for your neck.
A variety of seat cushion designs makes it easy to change the look of your POÄNG chair and your living room.
To sit even more comfortably and relaxed, you can use the armchair together with a POÄNG ottoman.
10-year limited warranty. Read about the terms in the limited warranty brochure.
DesignerNoboru Nakamura

item.title: HYLTRAP
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: HYLTARP is an inviting family sofa where everyone wants to spend lots of time. It’s very comfy, has all the essential features – and a classic, clean-lined look that is also pleasing on the eye.
item.content:encoded:
Skillful craftsmanship and a perfect fit means that the sofa will always shows off its best side.
The sofa have a soft comfort with high-resilience foam and pocket springs that follow your body and provide support – whether you are sitting, lying down or hanging out on the sofa.
Reversible back cushions provide soft support for your back and two different sides to wear. Thanks to the combination of polyester fibers and foam the cushions will retain their shape and comfort year after year.
This cover is made of Gransel, a fabric with elements of linen and viscose that add a slight luster. The threads in different sizes create a natural, vibrant expression.
The cover is easy to keep clean since it is removable and can be machine washed.
A range of coordinated covers makes it easy for you to give your furniture a new look.
10 year Limited warranty. Read about the terms in the warranty brochure.

item.title: FRIHETEN
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: After a good night’s sleep, you can effortlessly convert your bedroom or guest room into a living room again. The built-in storage is easy to access and spacious enough to store bedding, books and PJs.
item.content:encoded:
This sofa converts quickly and easily into a spacious bed when you remove the back cushions and pull out the underframe.
Sofa, chaise and double bed in one.
Storage space under the chaise. The lid stays open so you can safely and easily take things in and out.
You can place the chaise section to the left or right of the sofa, and switch whenever you like.
10 year Limited warranty. Read about the terms in the warranty brochure.
DesignerIKEA of Sweden

item.title: KIVIK
item.dc:creator: bharat123
item.description: Cuddle up in the comfortable KIVIK sofa. The generous size, low armrests and pocket springs with foam that adapts to the body invites you and your guests to many hours of socializing and relaxation.
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy the super comfy KIVIK sofa with deep seat cushions made of pocket springs, high resilience foam and polyester fibers – adding both firm support and relaxing softness.
The size and depth of the sofa make it perfect for a nice nap or when the whole family is gathered. There is room for everyone and even extra seating on the wide armrests.
The wide armrests have room for everything from your mobile phone to a bowl of movie snacks and very comfortable to lay your head on when you lie down on the sofa for a rest.
KIVIK sofa has a strong personality and a clear design language, while the options mean that you can easily match it with your home decor.
You can place the chaise section to the left or right of the sofa, and switch whenever you like.
The chaise can stand alone or be added onto the sofas.
It is easy to combine the sofa with one or more chaise lounges thanks to the removable armrests.
Pocket springs are a durable solution that makes the sofa retain both its shape and comfort for many years.
The Tresund fabric with a clear texture is made of 100 percent recycled polyester and cotton. It has a nice two-tone effect with a luster and a wonderfully soft feeling that adds to the comfort.
The cover is easy to keep clean since it can be machine washed and is easy to take off and put on again.
10-year guarantee. Read about the terms in the guarantee brochure.
